choices.label: The figure presents the first option, option A of question number 9. The option is: A meter of two four time.

The figure presents the fourth option, option D of question number 9. The option is: a meter of nine eight time.

content.answer: The figure presents the third option, option C of question number 9. The option is: a meter of six eight time
